segment.source: Windows Assessment Console common scenarios
segment.target: Windows Assessment Console common scenarios

segment.source: This section includes topics that describe how to perform common scenarios by using the Windows Assessment Console.
segment.target: This section includes topics that describe how to perform common scenarios by using the Windows Assessment Console.

segment.source: For more information about how to use the Windows Assessment Console, see Windows Assessment Console step-by-step guide.
segment.target: For more information about how to use the Windows Assessment Console, see Windows Assessment Console step-by-step guide.

segment.source: In This Section
segment.target: In This Section

segment.source: Analyze results on another device
segment.target: Analyze results on another device

segment.source: Collect only trace files for a job and process the results on another computer or at another time.
segment.target: Collect only trace files for a job and process the results on another computer or at another time.

segment.source: Automate reboots before you run an assessment
segment.target: Automate reboots before you run an assessment

segment.source: Configure automatic logon so that you can run an assessment without manually logging on to the computer after it reboots.
segment.target: Configure automatic logon so that you can run an assessment without manually logging on to the computer after it reboots.

segment.source: Compare results
segment.target: Compare results

segment.source: Open several results and compare them side by side.
segment.target: Open several results and compare them side by side.

segment.target: Create and run an energy efficiency job

segment.source: Assess the battery life and energy efficiency of a portable computer.
segment.target: Assess the battery life and energy efficiency of a portable computer.

segment.target: Create baseline results

segment.target: Obtain baseline assessment results for comparative purposes.

segment.target: Filter results

segment.source: Filter and sort job results by using metadata.
segment.target: Filter and sort job results by using metadata.

segment.source: Group, filter, and search issues
segment.target: Group, filter, and search issues

segment.source: Open multiple results and then group, filter, and sort the issues to find the information that you need.
segment.target: Open multiple results and then group, filter, and sort the issues to find the information that you need.

segment.source: Import results
segment.target: Import results

segment.source: Import results into the default results library so that they're available in the Windows Assessment Console.
segment.target: Import results into the default results library so that they're available in the Windows Assessment Console.

segment.source: Package a job and run it on another computer
segment.target: Package a job and run it on another computer

segment.source: Package that job so that it includes all the necessary files and tools to run on a different computer.
segment.target: Package that job so that it includes all the necessary files and tools to run on a different computer.

segment.source: Register custom assssments
segment.target: Register custom assssments

segment.source: Register assessments that you've developed and copied to your local computer.
segment.target: Register assessments that you've developed and copied to your local computer.

segment.source: Streaming media assessment: set up a remote server
segment.target: Streaming media assessment: set up a remote server

segment.source: Set up a remote computer to stream content when you're running the Streaming Media Performance assessment.
segment.target: Set up a remote computer to stream content when you're running the Streaming Media Performance assessment.
